text: Joaquim Molins i Amat (9 February 1945 – 13 July 2017) was a Spanish politician. He was born in Barcelona. He was a member of the Congress of Deputies (1979–1986 and again from 1993–2000) and Parliament of Catalonia (1988–1993). Molins died in Barcelona on 13 July 2017 of pancreatic cancer at the age of 72.Mor l'exconseller Joaquim Molins als 72 anys ==References== ==Other websites== * Información de Joaquim Molins en el Congreso de los Diputados Category:1945 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Spain Category:Politicians from Barcelona
title: Joaquim Molins i Amat
